rooms.description: Serves as the entryway into the apartment. Features a foyer with space for shoe racks and coat hooks. Aligns with Vastu principles by ensuring a calm transition from outdoors to indoors.
Open-plan area adjoining the kitchen, designed for family gatherings. Incorporates natural light and Vastu compliant south-east orientation to promote positivity.
Adjacent to the living room with flexible seating arrangements. Designed to facilitate both formal and casual dining settings.
A dedicated workspace positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor to ensure productivity and privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Essential for guests with basic fixtures. Placed strategically near the living area for convenience.
Spacious master suite with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Placed in the north-west direction as per Vastu for tranquility.
Secondary bedroom designed for family members or guests, ensuring sufficient privacy and comfort.
Additional bedroom with natural light exposure in the south direction, enhancing overall wellbeing.
Smaller bedroom for children or additional family members.
A shared bathroom located centrally on the floor plan to service all bedrooms efficiently.
